meanings.definition: Freeze (something) again after it has thawed.
meanings.sent1: After the ice cream melted, we had to refreeze it quickly.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to refreeze the meat if it starts to thaw.
meanings.sent3: The refreezing of the popsicles turned into a race against time.
meanings.sent4: She refroze her dreams, hoping they would solidify into reality.
meanings.sent5: The refreezing process made the water crystals sparkle like diamonds.

meanings.definition: The act of freezing something again after it has thawed.
meanings.sent1: The refreezing of the lake created a beautiful layer of ice.
meanings.sent2: We had to wait for the refreezing of the leftovers before storing them.
meanings.sent3: The refreezing of the juice made it look like a colorful ice sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The refreezing of the river was a natural phenomenon to behold.
meanings.sent5: The sudden refreezing of the pond caught the ducks by surprise.
